alert.note: Alert for Central Carbon County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; Laramie Valley; North Snowy Range Foothills; Shirley Basin; Snowy Range; Upper North Platte River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 3:45PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Thunderstorms with gusty outflow winds will impact portions of northeastern Carbon and north central Albany Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 344 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles southwest of Windy Peak to 8 miles southwest of Medicine Bow to 6 miles northwest of Rawlins. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rawlins, Hanna, Sinclair, Medicine Bow, Rock River, Elk Mountain, Battle Mountain, Separation Lake, Bow River Campground, Deep Creek Campground, Arlington and Teton Reservoir. This includes Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 200 and 288. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
